title: Nick of Time
description: Sarah Jones’s life is a lie. She thought she married a hero who protected the innocent, but behind closed doors he became her worst nightmare—a monster she and her children could not escape. Officer Nick Astenbeck has loved Sarah for years. Unable to watch her build a life with someone else, he kept his distance after she married his partner, Seth...allowing Sarah to suffer through a hell he should have prevented.When Seth unexpectedly dies, Sarah believes she's finally free. But with the accounts her husband controlled turning up empty, an unexpected baby on the way, and a series of suspicious events, she’s forced to ask for Nick’s help. However Nick's offer of protection comes with something more than Sarah expected. Or wanted. As the threats escalate, placing her and her children’s lives on the line, Sarah knows she must find a way to let go of the past and give Nick the trust he deserves if they’re to survive, and have a chance at happily ever after.
author: Julieanne Reeves
